name: Hypnic Fall (GDFredd)
description:
Have you ever dreamed that you fall and wake up because of it? 

Hypnic Fall is a platformer Grappling Hook game about that exactly! With an emphasis in skill, frustration and exploration, the goal is to reach the top without falling. If you fall, you wake up from the dream. Next time you'll start from the bottom of the DREAM! But don't worry, you can get upgrades along the way to help you in your next try.

 If you manage to reach the top, that means you managed to sleep the whole night without waking up. 

Can you beat the Dev's Record?

Good Luck, Try not to wake up in the middle of the night! Controls:
  • WASD - Move
  • Right Click - Shoot Hookgun
  • Left Click - Snap back Hookgun
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Space -Jump
  • Esc - Menu
Known Issues to be fixed:

This game was made using Godot 4 Alpha as an experiment of mine to see how much you can accomplish with the current state of the Engine, thus issues are to be expected since the Engine is in the Alpha stage. If  you find issues please let me know so I can list them here for players to know before hand. Some of them I'm going to fix, but some of them may not have a proper solution until the engine is released.

  • Slot Machine is not working properly (Sorted)
  • Not tested on Linux and Mac yet
  • Integrated GPU's are having problems running the game (Be sure to have your drivers up to date)
